type: Legendary Creature – Human Dragon Lord Noble
rules_text:
[i]Engage![/i] – {1}{R}{W}{B} [i](You may put this card under another legendary creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)[/i]
[i]Dragon Vein [/i]– Whenever Corrin, Emblem of Fate engages or attacks, you may tap an untapped land you control. If you do, choose one –
• Support 2.
• Create two tapped Treasure tokens.
• Surveil 2.
